directions: In a blender or food processor purée all ingredients with salt and pepper to taste until smooth.Pesto keeps in a jar with a tight-fitting lid, chilled, up to 1 week.
Let pesto come to room temperature before using. Makes about 1 cup.
ingredients: 2/3 cup firmly packed fresh basil leaves
2/3 cup firmly packed fresh mint leaves
2/3 cup firmly packed fresh parsley leaves
2 large garlic cloves, minced and mashed to a paste with 1/2 teaspoon salt
1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, or to taste
title: Three-Herb Pesto
